name: Agile Testing Days 2016
body:
We have plenty to test and play with.

Leave something on our legacy wall that you'd like the next person to know. Ideas that inspire get kudos.

This year, you can:

##Play (and test)
* Little Bits circuits, including Arduino
* Particle Photon IoT devices
* Codebugs
* A USB sensor that talks to Scratch
* IoT Hue lamps
* WeMo mains switches
* IFTTT
* A big line-following robot (that doesn't yet follow lines)
* Two tiny line-following robots
* A sphero robot, and a maze to make it roll round
* Black-box puzzles

##Test (and play)
Our subject this year is [Ghost](http://www.ghost.org) – an open source blogging platform. 
* Test our [install](http://139.59.150.27) of Ghost. More installs to follow.

If you'd like a little more direction, please help us...
* Investigate Ghost with OWASP tools
* Get jMeter (or Gatling) running
* Set up and test a Kubernetes resilient cluster


<!--
### Welcome to the TestLab.
Here's something to test: 
* [GetOnTracks](http://128.199.51.34) username ATD2015 | ATD2015 – or ask us to set you up an isolated environment.
* [GenerateData](http://generatedata.workroomprds.com/generatedata-3.2.1/)
-->

Follow @TheTestLab, @workroomprds and @bart_knaack
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
